Content: I like the idea of the app. I never got far enough to find out what it does because everytime I write in my diary it freezes and I have to restrart my phone. I'll uninstall it but if you fix it I'll definately re-install it!

Hello, I'd really love to use this app but it doesn't function well on my Tablet. Can you fix this problem, please? I want to give thumbs up on this app but I can't use it. Whenever I open the app, it always crash and goes back at my homescreen. Fix it please, thank you. :)
It didn't work when I clicked the pic icon it crashed

Loved the interface of this thing. One thing tho, I see that between the video and camera icon theres an icon of music which I assume I can put music and read while listening for a music. But the problem is, everytime I press that icon, the apps crash and it just stopped and went to home menu. Hopefully you can do something bout it. I really loved this apps.
Game crashes when I'm writing, also when I try to put an attachment to a post. No italics or bolding makes it more difficult to convey what I mean.
App crashes a lot and data also doesn't sync... Going with someone else. 😔 😔 😔
